title: Legendary Pursuit Completed, but did not receive orb :(
body: Legendary Pursuit and pickem quests completed at the same time.  However I did not receive a orb for completing the mission.   No idea why I did not get an orb :(

replies.body: Took me a little bit to confirm, but I do see that the orb was added to your account even if it took a few minutes to get there. Double check for me again if you don't mind!
Same happen to me, still not have it

hmm I don't see it....  If it shows up that I got it don't worry about it.     Does it show that I forged it? and If I got something?  

Thanks
